titles.title: Corps of Engineers Recreation Improvement Act
A bill to amend the Federal Lands Recreation Enhancement Act to include the Corps of Engineers as a Federal land management agency, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: 2/28/2013--Introduced. Corps of Engineers Recreation Improvement Act - Amends the Federal Lands Recreation Enhancement Act to include the Corps of Engineers as a federal land management agency.
